name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans

reviews.name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans
reviews.reviewText: I am quite happy with these jeans and will buy this style from now on. I have been having problems with stretch jeans because of my belly where I need the stretch. They are not baggy in the seat area and they wash and dry nicely. I am of average height and they fit me in the length also. May be too long for anyone under 5' 6".
reviews.title: So pleased with my new go to jeans!

reviews.name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans
reviews.reviewText: As usual Chic is right on the money. I know when I buy Chic jeans they will fit and be of good quality. I was not disappointed.
reviews.title: Chic remains the same year after year

reviews.name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans
reviews.reviewText: I have been wearing Chic Jeans for some time. I enjoy them so much but could not find them locally. I did not get what I thought they would be, maybe my mistake, not sure. I had been getting all cotton in Petite. These were avg. in a very strechty fabric.. Very comfortable but I had to shorten them a couple of inches. Still glad I ordered them.
reviews.title: Good for Price, very comfortable

reviews.name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans
reviews.reviewText: I was a little scared buying these jeans due to the fact that I have had trouble in the past with the Chic brand. However, these fit beautiful. I just love them, was surprised that they were the right gifit at the waist.(Other slacks from chic have been very small at the waist and threw the legs.) These are super, and will purchase them again.
reviews.title: Great jeans

reviews.name: Chic Women's Plus-Size Stretch Pull-On Jeans
reviews.reviewText: Love these. They are strechy and they fit very nice. They are advertised as jeans and fit like jeans but the package said leggings. They are not. The front pockets are shallow compared to regular jeans. I do plan to order more of these.
reviews.title: Very comfortable
